title: Word Stack
description: Build a stack of 5-letter words by dragging letters! Free word puzzle game - play instantly in your browser.

title: Reflex Ring
description: Tap precisely as the arrow hits the highlighted segment. Speeds up over time.

title: Snapadile
description: Tap the crocs before they reach your raft. More and faster crocs over time.

title: Car Crash
description: Switch lanes to dodge incoming cars. Step-based movement with growing difficulty.

title: Fill the Cup
description: Hold to pour water and fill each glass to the highlighted band. Smaller targets over time.

title: Flash Bash
description: Watch the sequence of colored shapes, then mimic them before time runs out. Sequences get longer!

title: Ho Ho Home Delivery
description: Drop presents into chimneys from Santa's sleigh. Nail the landing, avoid misses. 3 lives!

title: Ready Steady Shoot
description: Hold to pick angle, hold to pick power, then release to shoot. Swish for 2 points! 3 lives.

title: Paddle Pop
description: Deflect the marble, collect power-ups, hit bonus discs, avoid falling obstacles.

title: Word Rush with Tom
description: Guess words and phrases with your selected letters. 2-minute timer per level!

title: Serpento
description: Classic snake game. Turn left/right to collect food, avoid walls and yourself. Gets faster as you grow!

title: Blocker
description: Drag puzzle pieces into a 8x8 board, clear full lines, trigger power blocks, and chase combos before you run out of moves.

title: Hoop City
description: Tap to keep the ball afloat while threading every vertical hoop as the city scrolls by.

title: Cosmic Clash
description: Space Invaders-style shooter. Auto-fire at descending aliens, collect power-ups, survive waves!

title: Box Cutter
description: Draw lines to capture territory while avoiding the bouncing enemy ball.
